original: Kemner, Lars Fredrik, konstnär, Grebbestad, f. 10/4/19 i Upps. av Arvid K. o. Antoinette Carlsson. G. 45 m. skolkökslär. Anna Grettve. — Stud. v. Konsthögsk. 37-42. Verks. s. landskapsmålare m. motiv huvudsakl. fr. slätterna kring Upps. samt västkusten (Bohuslän). Deit. i Upplandsutst. i Upps. o. Gävle samt utst. i Eskilstuna, separatutst. i Upps. 44.
translated: Kemner, Lars Fredrik, artist, Grebbestad, born on 10/4/19 in Uppsala, son of Arvid K. and Antoinette Carlsson. Married in 1945 to Anna Grettve, a school kitchen teacher. Studied at the Art Academy from 1937 to 1942. Works primarily as a landscape painter, focusing on the plains around Uppsala and the West Coast (Bohuslän). Exhibited at the Uppland exhibition in Uppsala and Gävle, as well as exhibitions in Eskilstuna. Had a solo exhibition in Uppsala in 1944.

structured.name: Lars Fredrik Kemner
structured.description: Lars Fredrik Kemner is a Swedish artist known for his landscape paintings of the plains around Uppsala and the West Coast (Bohuslän). He was born on October 4, 1919, in Uppsala. Lars Fredrik Kemner married Anna Grettve, a school kitchen teacher, in 1945. He studied at the Art Academy from 1937 to 1942. Lars Fredrik Kemner exhibited his works at the Uppland exhibition in Uppsala and Gävle, as well as in Eskilstuna. He also had a solo exhibition in Uppsala in 1944.
